talk.author: did:plc:ybwrht5pve2wbss5hpbtqqlz
talk.utter: You one of those abstainers? Have no use for you

talk.author: did:plc:7ih2ud7d5wjbzyxrksyoz24t
talk.utter: I voted. I just hold no illusions that either side have my interests at heart.

talk.author: did:plc:7ih2ud7d5wjbzyxrksyoz24t
talk.utter:
I think we need education reforms, more worker's rights, social programs, among other things. We had some of those for a while, until they were rolled back. This is only inevitable, if you subscribe to Structural Marxism.
I hesitate to call myself a Socialist as I'm not educated well enough yet.

talk.author: did:plc:ybwrht5pve2wbss5hpbtqqlz
talk.utter: And you think Harris wouldn’t do all that? I think she would a least try. She would have been better than Trump. I don’t understand why you think both sides are the same, cause they aren’t. Trump will leave office much much richer than when he goes in. Corporations will get their tax cuts.
